page.title: 10HOME LIFE IN EAKRING (cont)
page.content: Video recorders record any programme you wish or you can hire a new film on video tape and watch it in the comfort of your home. More people are getting Computers and you can buy quite a selection of programmes, ranging from Games to Educational. Home Life in Eakring for women centres around their homes as there are limited opportunities for women to work after having children and while they are still at school because very few jobs cater for women with children. Some women go to various schools for classes with a wide range of subjects available. Sports facilities for all the family are quite near, Squash Courts and a Sauna at Bilsthorpe. Badminton, swimming and other indoor sports are available at Ollerton, Southwell and Rainworth Sports Centres.
